long_description: The SportRack 6-Pair Roof Top Ski/Snowboard mounts attach to your square, round or factory bars, and offer an easy way to transport up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 boards to the mountain. Included riser blocks increase rack height for better binding clearance. Soft padding on cradles protects skis and boards during travel. Locks and key for added security.
short_description: The SportRack 6-Pair Roof Top Ski/Snowboard mounts attach to your square, round or factory bars, and offer an easy way to transport up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 boards to the mountain.
